leagueRats.shortDescription: Real-time tracking application for League of Legends professional players and live game statistics
leagueRats.description: LeagueRats is a frontend application that enables real-time tracking of professional League of Legends players and their gameplay. Built with modern web technologies and integrated with the Riot Games API, it provides live match tracking, detailed game history, multi-account support, and secure Firebase integration.
leagueRats.learned: Riot Games API Integration, Real-Time Data Processing, Cloud Application Deployment, Performance Optimization, Docker Containerization, Gaming Industry Requirements
leagueRats.tags: gaming, esports, league-of-legends, real-time, statistics, tracking, api-integration, firebase, fastapi, docker, professional-gaming

ollamaChat.shortDescription: Local AI chatbot application with Docker & Ollama for privacy-focused conversations
ollamaChat.description: A powerful chatbot application enabling local deployment of large language models using Docker and Ollama. Features a modern Nuxt frontend with Django backend and MongoDB storage, ensuring complete privacy and control over AI conversations while maintaining professional-grade performance.
ollamaChat.learned: Local LLM Deployment, Docker Containerization, AI Integration, Full-Stack Architecture, Privacy-First Design, MongoDB with Django, Authentication Systems, Real-Time Communication
ollamaChat.tags: ai, chatbot, local-deployment, privacy, docker, full-stack, llm, open-source, machine-learning, self-hosted
